title: ğŸ“¢ Infinitum LIVE â€“ TikTok LIVE Platform Clarification & Network Policy Update
description:
ğŸ“¢ **IMPORTANT: TIKTOK LIVE & INFINITUM LIVE OFFICIAL UPDATE**

Creators,

We want to provide clear, accurate updates regarding recent changes related to TikTok LIVE and important Infinitum LIVE Creator Network policies. There has been a significant amount of confusion and misinformation circulating, so please read this notice carefully.

To be absolutely clear upfront:

**Infinitum LIVE Creator Network is not TikTok.**
We do not own TikTok, control TikTok systems, algorithms, enforcement actions, or payouts. Our role is to support creators within the rules, policies, and structure established by TikTok.

---

## ğŸ“± TikTok LIVE â€“ Current Platform Updates

### 1ï¸âƒ£ TikTok Ownership Update (U.S.)
Recent announcements confirm that TikTokâ€™s U.S. operations are now **majority U.S.-owned**, with **80.01% ownership under U.S. control**, and the remaining ownership held by ByteDance.

### 2ï¸âƒ£ U.S. Algorithm Retraining
TikTok is actively retraining and restructuring the **U.S. algorithm** to improve platform compliance, safety, and long-term stability.

- This does **not** remove access to global audiences
- U.S. creators continue to interact with worldwide creators and viewers

### 3ï¸âƒ£ U.S. Government Ownership Rumor â€” False
TikTok is **not owned by the U.S. government**. Claims suggesting direct government ownership are incorrect.

### 4ï¸âƒ£ Tracking & Privacy Clarification
There is **no forced 24/7 tracking** enabled by TikTok.

- TikTok does not automatically send location data or content to any government entity
- Location access is fully controlled by your phoneâ€™s app permissions, like any other app
- Any law-enforcement access would require proper legal process, consistent with all major platforms

---

## ğŸ›¡ï¸ Infinitum LIVE Creator Network â€“ Policy Updates

The following policies are **TikTok LIVEâ€“specific** and are **not optional**.

### 5ï¸âƒ£ Creator Activity Requirement (Strict Enforcement)
Any creator who is **inactive for 3 months or longer** will be removed from the Infinitum LIVE Creator Network.

- No exceptions
- No exclusions
- No retroactive excuses

If you have not gone LIVE in 3 months or longer, you are considered inactive. To remain in the network, you must resume going LIVE immediately.

---

## ğŸ’ Diamond Incentive Program Update

### 6ï¸âƒ£ Temporary Pause â€” March 2026
The Infinitum LIVE Creator Network **Diamond Incentive Program (D.I.P)** will be inactive during the following period:

**March 1, 2026 â€“ March 31, 2026**

- No Diamond Incentive payouts will apply during this period
- This temporary pause is required to restructure and align with updated TikTok LIVE platform rules

New, revised Diamond Incentive pay charts will be released and will go live on **April 1, 2026**, applying going forward. Creators who have previously signed the agreement remain **automatically enrolled**.

---

## ğŸ§  Final Notes

We understand that platform changes can create uncertainty. Our goal is to remain transparent, fully compliant, and aligned with TikTokâ€™s evolving LIVE environment while protecting the long-term stability of both our creators and the network.

If you have questions, please contact your assigned manager or use official Infinitum LIVE communication channels.

Thank you for your continued effort, professionalism, and commitment.

title: ğŸ“¡ TikTok LIVE Match â€“ "Viewers Not Matched" Message Explained ğŸ“¡
description:
ğŸ“¡ **TikTok LIVE Match â€“ "Viewers Not Matched" Message Explained** ğŸ“¡

Hi Creators,

We wanted to clarify a common issue some of you may encounter during TikTok LIVE Matches: the **"Viewers Not Matched"** message. This appears when TikTok's algorithm is unable to pair you with another host for a LIVE battle due to insufficient overlap or compatibility between your audiences.

### Why This Happens:
â€¢ **Low Viewer Engagement** â€“ If there's minimal interaction on your stream, TikTok may not detect enough activity to create a successful match.
â€¢ **Audience Mismatch** â€“ Major differences in your audience's interests or behavior compared to the other host may prevent pairing.
â€¢ **Technical Glitches** â€“ Occasionally, the issue may stem from platform bugs or connection problems.

In most cases, this simply means your viewers were not engaging enough at the time of the match. We encourage you to keep promoting active interaction during your streams to improve match success!

Stay consistent, stay creative, and keep going LIVE ğŸ’

â€“ Infinitum LIVE Creator Network

title: ğŸ“£ Infinitum Policy Update: Box Battles & Guest Boxes
description:
ğŸ“¢ **Official PSA â€” Policy on Box Battles & Guest Box Participation**

Effective immediately, Infinitum LIVE Creator Network will **not** join or moderate any battle-box or box-battle events hosted by accounts outside our network. Additionally, Infinitum will no longer schedule or promote battle-box sessions of our own.

**Why this change matters**
1. **Earnings Impact** â€“ Battle-box revenue now diverts a larger share to the host, so you earn **significantly less** than in standard 1-to-1 battles or solo LIVE sessions.
2. **Monthly LIVE-Time Compliance** â€“ Minutes spent as a *guest* in someone else's box **do not count** toward Infinitum's required monthly LIVE-time thresholds. Only hours streamed from your own host window are credited.
3. **Algorithmic Performance** â€“ Appearing in boxesâ€”especially when cameras are switched offâ€”lowers viewer retention and **suppresses your reach on the For You Page**.
4. **Brand & Viewer Experience** â€“ Camera-off boxes hurt professionalism and viewer trust.

**Infinitum's stance**
â€¢ We **do not encourage** participation in box battles under current payout and visibility conditions.
â€¢ We **will not** enter external battles to push scores, gifts, or rankings.
â€¢ We **will continue** supporting your growth through coaching, strategic 1-to-1 battles, goal tracking, and high-value LIVE formats that maximize diamonds and audience retention.

**Your next steps**
â€¢ Focus on **solo or 1-to-1 battles** hosted from your own account.
â€¢ Maintain **camera-on, high-quality streams** to drive algorithmic favorability.
â€¢ Track your hours in InfiniVIEW to ensure they count toward monthly targets.
â€¢ Direct questions to your Creator Network Manager or open a ticket in the "LIVE Support" Discord channel.

Introducing the Infinitum LIVE TikTok Raid Chain â€“ a community-powered, momentum-building experience where we pass viewers from one creator to the nextâ€”just like Twitch raids, but made for us and made for TikTok.

ğŸš€ What's a TikTok Raid?

title: Important Reminder to All Infinitum LIVE Creators ğŸ“£
description:
Dear Creators,

We want to take a moment to thank you for your continued trust and dedication as a member of the Infinitum LIVE Creator Network. Our community thrives because of your commitment, creativity, and loyalty â€” and we are proud to support you every step of the way.

However, it has come to our attention that some creators have been contacted by outside networks or individuals attempting to poach or lure creators away from our community. Please understand:

ğŸ”’ This is a direct violation of both TikTok LIVE policy and your agreement with Infinitum LIVE Creator Network.

â— Entertaining offers, conversations, or invitations from other networks while contracted with Infinitum is strictly prohibited. These actions are not only a breach of contract, but they can result in serious consequences for both the creator and the violating network.

ğŸš« If You Leave Due to Poaching:
The violating agency will be reported to TikTok.
That agency will receive violation points, which may lead to the termination of their agency status with TikTok.
Infinitum will pursue legal action against any individual or entity who violates our agreements or attempts to disrupt the integrity of our network.

ğŸš« If a Creator in Our Network Starts Their Own Agency:
This is a breach of contract and will result in termination from Infinitum LIVE.
It will also trigger legal enforcement actions, including possible claims for damages, as outlined in the agreement you signed.

We do not take these matters lightly. Our contracts are legally binding, enforceable, and designed to protect the time, effort, and trust we all put into this network.

ğŸ¤ Need Help or Have Questions?
If you're ever unsure, uncomfortable, or just need support â€” please reach out to your assigned manager or email us directly at support@infinitumlive.com. We are here for you. Always.

Thank you again for being a valued part of the Infinitum family. Together, we grow stronger. ğŸ’

â€” Infinitum LIVE Creator Network

**MARK: Documentation Overview**

- **Active Recruit:** Indicates whether the recruiter status is active (YES or NO).
- **Tier:** Designates the level or rank (e.g., Rookie).
- **Valid Days:** Total number of days that the current status remains valid (e.g., 7).
- **Hours:** Represents allotted or tracked hours during the valid period (e.g., 15).
- **Diamonds REQ:** Specifies the required diamonds or points (e.g., 20,000).
- **Pay:** Denotes the monetary payout for this tier and status (e.g., $10).
